children.subject: If you are receiving any financial aid and scholarships, make sure to talk to a financial aid advisor about the terms of your scholarships also. They are separate from college advisors.

history.content:
Hi, the drop deadline is coming soon, and I really want to drop ee16b to take next semester. However, that will reduce me to 11 units. I am hoping to petition for a reduced course load as I am currently interning part time for a developer role. This should be able to be done according to this link:

https://engineering.berkeley.edu/students/undergraduate-guide/policies-procedures/scholarship-progress/#ac12283

I have scheduled meetings with my advisors, is there anything else I should be aware of? I just want to be sure, since the drop deadline is coming and I want to add a decal if for any reason this cannot be done.
history.subject: Petition to take reduced course load due to part time work

history.content: Hi, the drop deadline is coming soon, and I really want to drop ee16b to take next semester. However, that will reduce me to 11 units. I am hoping to petition for a reduced course load as I am currently interning part time for a developer role. How can I accomplish this? I am also a senior if that helps.
history.subject: Petition to take reduced course load due to part time work
